original_text: And as soon as Ahab heard that Naboth was dead, Ahab arose to go down to the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite, to take possession of it.
korean_text: 아합은 나봇이 죽었다 함을 듣고 곧 일어나 이스르엘 사람 나봇의 포도원을 차지하러 그리로 내려갔더라

sentences.original_text: And as soon as Ahab heard that Naboth was dead
Ahab arose to go down to the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite
sentences.korean_translation: 아합은 일어나 이스르엘 사람 나봇의 포도원으로 내려가
